name: dragons_maze_megapack
description: A gigantic, guild-spanning package inspired by Dragon's Maze (RTR block): includes Detain, Overload, Unleash, Populate, Scavenge, Cipher, Battalion, Bloodrush, Evolve, Extort, Gate-matters, and a Maze's End–style alt win. Designed for very large sets with rich token pools and multicolor synergies.

Creature: Detain — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, {TARGET_NONLAND_PERMANENT} is detained until your next turn. (A detained permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Whenever CARDNAME attacks, detain {TARGET_NONLAND_PERMANENT}.
Battalion — Whenever CARDNAME and at least two other creatures attack, {BATTALION_EFFECT}.
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {HYBRID_WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
CARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Gate.
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, {GATE_TRIGGER_EFFECT}.
Instant: Populate. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Sorcery: Detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control.
Search your library for a Gate card, reveal it, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Draw a card for each Gate you control.
Enchantment: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn, {BATTALION_EFFECT}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature can't attack or block as long as you control a Gate.
Enchant creature. When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, detain enchanted creature.
Activated: {ACTIVATED_COST}: Detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Populate.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Scavenge {SCAVENGE_COST_SHORT}.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target creature gets +{BR_P}/{BR_T} and gains trample until end of turn.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: CARDNAME gains 'Extort' until end of turn.

When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value {MV_LEQ_3} from your graveyard encoded onto CARDNAME. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, copy the encoded card and you may cast the copy.
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, {IZZET_ETB}.
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
CARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Gate.
Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, {GATE_TRIGGER_EFFECT}.
Instant: Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Detain each of them.
Return target spell you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {OVERLOAD_2}. (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, replace 'target' with 'each'.)
Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card. Overload {OVERLOAD_1}.
Draw a card. You may exile CARDNAME encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, copy this card and you may cast the copy.
Sorcery: Create a token that's a copy of target creature token you control, then cipher CARDNAME onto a creature you control. (Exile this spell encoded on that creature...)
Search your library for a Gate card, reveal it, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Draw a card for each Gate you control.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy it. If you do, the copy gains overload {OVERLOAD_1}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature has 'Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, {CIPHER_ON_HIT_SHORT}.'
AuraLand: Enchant land. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, scry 1. If you control a Gate, draw a card.

TRIGGER_INTRO: at the beginning of your end step,
CIPHER_ON_HIT: return target creature to its owner's hand
create a 1/1 blue Rogue creature token that's unblockable until end of turn
BATTALION_EFFECT: creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn
CARDNAME gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn
tap target creature an opponent controls
it deals 1 damage to each of up to two targets
IZZET_ETB: CARDNAME deals {DAMAGE_SMALL} damage to any target
return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand
string_pools.SCAVENGE_REMINDER: Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
GATE_TRIGGER_EFFECT: create a 1/1 colorless Gatekeeper artifact creature token with '{TAP}: Add {C}'
target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn
